title: Riot NA New Client "attempting to reconnect"
body: I hav been demoted bout three times thought it would be better on the new patch but i keep lagging out with attempt to reconnect eventually or it happens to someone else. Are there similar experiances.

replies.body:
Yeouch that sucks that you were demoting three times for this X_X....I really don't want you to get demoted or otherwise hurt by this issue anymore. While we troubleshoot this, make sure to test the changes in a custom game first!

Most of the time when you get stuck on that attempting to reconnect message, it's really happening because something is blocking your network's connection to our servers. Let's make sure to check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case something was reset, but hit me back up if you still can't stay in those games!
